message: When I go to search I  see lists of individual comments - those are helpful but I'd rather see groups that I might be interested in. Could search segment both -- perhaps list groups with the keyword first - then below a list of conversations (or perhaps the option to "click to show conversations" mentioning the keyword?
Ok I see you can search also for groups under Discover - but why two places (one for conversations and one for groups) -- should search handle them both?
It would be awesome to see what has already been posted.
Kudos on the new search page.  Much more helpful in finding content.
I agree. Even in this feedback section, its very needed
